summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview of a Correctional Officer from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, conducted on July 15, 2021. The interview is part of an official OIG investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York in August 2019. The memorandum lists attachments including the interview transcript and prison logs from the time of Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation; a BOP inmate (Register Number 76318-054) who died while housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.

persons.name: Correctional Officer
persons.context: A BOP employee at MCC New York who was interviewed by OIG agents regarding the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the Correctional Officer as part of the OIG investigation.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Assisted in conducting the voluntary interview of the Correctional Officer.

persons.name: Attorney
persons.context: Present during the interview of the Correctional Officer, providing legal representation.

persons.name: Legal Intern
persons.context: Present during the interview of the Correctional Officer, assisting with legal representation.

connections.description: The OIG Senior Special Agent interviewed the Correctional Officer as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The OIG Special Agent assisted in interviewing the Correctional Officer regarding the Epstein investigation.
The Attorney (along with a Legal Intern) was present as legal representation for the Correctional Officer during the OIG interview.
The Legal Intern was present as part of the legal team representing the Correctional Officer during the OIG interview.
The Correctional Officer was a Senior Officer Specialist at MCC New York when inmate Jeffrey Epstein was housed there.

events.title: OIG Interview of Correctional Officer
events.description: DOJ Office of the Inspector General agents conducted a voluntary, recorded interview of a Correctional Officer from MCC New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein's final night in custody
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at MCC New York; prison logs from August 9-10, 2019, are attached to the investigation file.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, New York
OIG New York Field Office, New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted an interview with a Correctional Officer from MCC New York on July 15, 2021, as part of its investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The interviewed Correctional Officer was a Senior Officer Specialist at MCC New York when Epstein was housed there.
The interview was recorded and transcribed, and the officer was represented by an Attorney and a Legal Intern.
Attachments to the memorandum include prison logs and reports from August 9-10, 2019, the period surrounding Epstein's death.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum that states it contains neither recommendations nor conclusions of the investigation.
